startDate.description: The start date of the data collection period.

endDate.description: The end date of the data collection period.

asin.description: The ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) of the product.

purchasedWithAsin.description: The ASINs of the products that were frequently purchased with this ASIN.

purchasedWithRank.description: The ranking of products that were frequently purchased with this ASIN.

combinationPct.description: The percentage of times this ASIN was purchased with another ASIN.

dataEndTime.description: The date and time when the data collection ended.

queryEndDate.description: The end date of the query period.
